name: Emme Saves the Galaxy
description:
Aim, Shoot, and Destroy - It's up to you to destroy the enemy blocks. The goal is to clear all blocks before they make it to the bottom of the screen.

Hours of Playtime - Emme Saves the Galaxy features 200 challenging levels!

Created by
Elliott Ridgway - lead programmer, musician
Daniel Jackson - level designer, sound designer
Adrian Carter - artist
